content.text:
Show detailed Claude Context Sync status and what will be synced.

```bash
python3 ~/claude-sync-extended.py status
```

content.text:
The sync status shows:

**Synced items (✓):**
- Claude config files (`~/.claude.json`, settings)
- Session data from `~/.claude/projects/` 
- User commands from `~/.claude/commands/`

**Missing items (✗):**
- `CLAUDE.md` context file (current directory)
- Global `~/.claude/CLAUDE.md`
- User agents from `~/.claude/agents/`
- Credentials file

Currently configured for **full** sync with repository `https://github.com/davide-f98/claude-sync.git` using machine ID `523df774`.

Perform complete bidirectional sync of ALL Claude data.

```bash
cd ~
echo "🔄 Performing full Claude data sync..."
python3 ~/claude-sync-extended.py sync
echo "✅ Complete sync finished!"
echo ""
echo "📊 Synced data includes:"
echo "  • 💬 All conversation sessions"
echo "  • ⚙️  Claude settings and preferences" 
echo "  • 🔌 MCP server configurations"
echo "  • 📝 Project-specific contexts"
echo "  • 🗂️  User commands and agents"
```

content.text: Full sync completed successfully! All Claude data has been synchronized bidirectionally.

Pull ALL Claude data from remote repository (sessions, settings, MCP configs).

```bash
cd ~
echo "🔄 Pulling full Claude data from remote..."
python3 ~/claude-sync-extended.py pull
echo "✅ Full data sync completed!"
echo "📋 Your sessions, settings, and MCP configs are now synchronized"
```

input.command: cd ~ && echo "🔄 Pulling full Claude data from remote..." && python3 ~/claude-sync-extended.py pull && echo "✅ Full data sync completed!" && echo "📋 Your sessions, settings, and MCP configs are now synchronized"
